title: Sonic Riders - Custom PKG file for PS3 (PS2 Classics) 4.21+ [REV
description:
A custom made ps2 classics pkg I created with ps2 classic tools and making my own game rip of the original game. This is like the plceholder, but reserved to always play sonic riders. I've confirmed this to work with Rebug 4.21 and 4.30

Comes with instructions to know how to properly install.

This one has artwork on the xmb screen when you go over the game. I was being lazy and forgot to change it in the other one :D

So download this one instead.
